description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Test your reaction and kill evil snowmen bevor they kill you. Press the buttons that appear at the screen and survive as long as you can. But be careful, they are getting faster and faster. Version 2
